original_text: And, lo, while she yet talked with the king, Nathan the prophet also came in.
korean_text: 밧세바가 왕과 말할 때에 선지자 나단이 들어온지라

sentences.original_text: while she yet talked with the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 아직 왕과 이야기하고 있는 동안

sentences.original_text: Nathan the prophet also came in
